name: Disruptors of Space
description:
Description:
Disruptors of Space is a arcade style shoot'em up. The player must survive the waves of enemies that continually grow in number level by level. Every few levels the player can encounter boss enemies, each subsequent boss level will also increase in difficulty.

The players main goal is to survive past each level, racking up as many points as they possibly can to achieve a new high score. Points are scored based on enemy kills.
